list_definition.definition: something bought cheaply and giving good value for money

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: This carpet was a real bargain.

list_definition.definition: to argue about or discuss a price etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I bargained with him and finally got the price down.
